availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George T. Shackelford (Madison County, Kentucky, deputy clerk and soldier)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky deputy clerk and soldier. Illinois native. Son of J.M. Schackelford and Mallissa W. Shackelford. Deputy Clerk in Madison County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the 6th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Adjutant from December 24, 1861 to May 18, 1863. Served in the 6th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Lieutenant Colonel from May 18, 1863 to.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Richmond, p. 251A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Richmond, p. 144.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 718.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 207.
